resources:
Rock Paper Scissor Lizard Spock GAME ON! A game developed by Stryke Corp. Rules Help and Rules exit_tutorial Rock Paper Scissor Lizard Spock image header SCORE: You Computer 0 0 Reset Image Reset ""
IT\'S A TIE! YOU LOSE!> YOU WIN!
"Ouch … with stone against stone you may break a bone." "That's a nice wrap for such a ugly rock …" "Spock is vaping rocks tonight baby!" "Your rock just crushed my scissor … and my dreams :(" "WOW, YOU PSYCHO! You just crushed my little lizard friend with that rock!"
"Paper,paper,paper … are we working for Dunder Mifflin?" "Chop chop chop … I'm cutting deep bro." "Lizard is hungry, got eat some paper … I guess!?" "WHAT? How can paper disproves Spock?" "Take your toilet paper from around my nice rock right now!"
"Wait … are you scissoring me? I'm gonna call the police!" "ROuCK SMASH !!!." "Spock is not running with scissors!" "Cut my paper into pieces … this is my last resort." "Jeez man, you just decapitated a little lizard?"
"Look its the Lizard of OZ and Queen Elizardbeth!" "With great stone comes great crushability." "Relax man, I just cut the tail, it's gonna grow up again." "Come on, I'm telling the teacher you ate my homework!." "Congratulations! You just poisoned a geek symbol of our generation."
"DOUBLE SPOCK! DO NOT google that!" "Technology is never gonna replace the good old Paper!" "Rompopopom rompopopom rompopopom Spock man down." "Sometimes life give you rocks, sometimes Spock vaporizes them…" "Spock is in the neighbourhood, hide your scissors, hide your wife."
